actions-list.header: Commission to Study the Potential Creation of a National Museum of Asian Pacific History and Culture
actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to Section 2(b)(4) of Public Law 117-140, the Democratic Leader appointed the following individual to the Commission to Study the Potential Creation of a National Museum of Asian Pacific History and Culture: Mr. Dennis Cheng of New York, New York.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to clause 13 of Rule I, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Riley M. Moore to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
